title: Pregnant Ashley Graham beams as she puts baby bump on display in skintight dress

Pregnant Ashley Graham looked glowing as she showed off her baby bump today.

The American model flashed a huge smile as she stepped out in New York earlier today wearing a super skintight dress.

The star, 32, donned a burnt orange frock as she made her way to the Today talk show.

She paired her smart outfit with chunky black boots featuring a printed heel and small hoop earrings while out and about.

The plus-size model looked dressed for the occasion while making her way past paparazzi.

Ashley first publicly announced her pregnancy with husband Justin Ervin back in August.

On the day they were celebrating their ninth wedding anniversary - the pair dropped the baby news to mark the occasion.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

Stroking her bump, Ashley wrote next to the post: "Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life.

"It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world!

"Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY!

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

"Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin Life is about to get even better," she added.

In the video, the pair first tricked fans by only focusing on their faces as they stood outside in the golden sunshine.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

"SURPRISE!" Ashley yelled at the camera as it zoomed out to show her growing baby bump.

The pair kissed as Justin tenderly rubbed his wife's stomach and they giggled into the lens.

And shortly after, the pregnant star showed off her baby bump in all its glory with a naked snap.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: Instagram)

The brunette beauty looked absolutely sensational as she let her robe hang loose off her shoulders and covered her breasts with her hands.

Just the right placement of her leg preserved her modesty as she revealed her beautiful pregnancy body.

(Image: Instagram)

Ashley had been enjoying some much-deserved me time as she headed off to the spa for a massage.

She captioned her snap: "Practicing some serious self care and feeling grateful for an hour and a half of massage bliss".
description: The model, 32, showed off her pregnancy body in the skintight ensemble and she couldn't stop grinning
